MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Fauldburn and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:41am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required due to onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:19AM on Friday 23 April 2021.
